actor_awards.notes: She was awarded two stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame (one for Motion Pictures and one for Television). She won the Laurel Award for Topliner Supporting Actress for 'The Ten Commandments'. She also won the Best Actress award at the 1987 Fantafestival for 'American Gothic'.

filmography.title: The Ten Commandments
filmography.role_description: The modest and devoted wife of Moses, a Midianite shepherdess who stands by him during his transformation into a prophet.
filmography.plot: The Egyptian Prince Moses learns of his true heritage as a Hebrew and his divine mission as the deliverer of his people.
filmography.awards: Laurel Awards: Win – Topliner Supporting Actress; AFI: 100 Years... 100 Cheers (#79), 100 Heroes & Villains (Moses #43)

filmography.title: Brute Force
filmography.role_description: A woman waiting on the outside for a prisoner, seen in flashbacks that explore the motivations of the inmates planning a daring escape.
filmography.plot: At a tough penitentiary, a group of inmates plans a breakout while clashing with a sadistic guard captain.

filmography.title: Criss Cross
filmography.role_description: A classic femme fatale who draws her ex-husband into a dangerous armored car heist scheme orchestrated by her new gangster husband.
filmography.plot: An armored truck driver and his lovely ex-wife conspire with a gang to have his own truck robbed on the route.

filmography.title: McLintock!
filmography.role_description: The attractive, widowed cook hired by cattle baron G.W. McLintock, who becomes a romantic interest for him and a rival to his estranged wife.
filmography.plot: Wealthy rancher G.W. McLintock uses his power and influence in the territory to keep the peace between farmers, ranchers, land-grabbers, Indians and corrupt government officials.

filmography.title: The Captain's Paradise
filmography.role_description: The passionate, fun-loving wife in North Africa who represents the wild side of a ship captain's double life.
filmography.plot: A ferry captain travels between Gibraltar and North Africa, maintaining a different wife and lifestyle in each port to satisfy his dual nature.

filmography.title: Death of a Scoundrel
filmography.role_description: A petty thief who becomes the business partner and eventual moral conscience of a ruthless financial manipulator.
filmography.plot: A Czech refugee uses women and ruthless business tactics to rise to the top of the New York financial world, making many enemies along the way.

filmography.title: Munster, Go Home!
filmography.role_description: De Carlo reprises her iconic TV role as the vampiric matriarch of the Munster clan in their first feature-length color film adventure.
filmography.plot: The Munster family heads to England to claim an aristocratic title, only to find their British relatives trying to scare them away.

filmography.title: Oscar
filmography.role_description: A comedic supporting role as the stern, traditional aunt in this screwball comedy about a mobster trying to go straight.
filmography.plot: A gangster attempts to keep his promise to his dying father that he will give up his life of crime and become a legal businessman.

filmography.title: Hotel Sahara
filmography.role_description: The fiancée of a hotel proprietor in the North African desert who must charm invading troops from different nations to save their hotel.
filmography.plot: A hotel owner and his fiancée in North Africa try to preserve their business by shifting allegiances whenever a new army occupies their oasis.

filmography.title: Black Bart
filmography.role_description: The famous historical dancer who becomes involved with the outlaw Black Bart in this Technicolor western.
filmography.plot: A charming outlaw leaves his gang to start a new life in California but gets pulled back into crime when he meets the dancer Lola Montez.

filmography.title: Shotgun
filmography.role_description: A strong-willed dance hall girl who joins a deputy marshal on a dangerous pursuit of a killer through Apache territory.
filmography.plot: A deputy marshal sets out to avenge the murder of a town marshal, accompanied by a dance hall girl and a bounty hunter.

filmography.title: Casbah
filmography.role_description: The jealous girlfriend of the thief Pepe Le Moko in this musical adaptation of 'Algiers'.
filmography.plot: A musical remake of 'Algiers' following the master thief Pepe Le Moko as he hides from the law in the mysterious Casbah section of Algiers.

filmography.title: Raw Edge
filmography.role_description: The widow of an Oregon baron who becomes the prize in a violent power struggle between local frontiersmen.
filmography.plot: In 1842 Oregon, a territory rule states that any unmarried woman belongs to the first man to claim her, sparking conflict when a baron's wife is widowed.

filmography.title: The San Francisco Story
filmography.role_description: A miner's former love who is now connected to a corrupt politician, creating a conflict of loyalty.
filmography.plot: Two friends in 1850s San Francisco find themselves on opposite sides of the law when they both fall for the same woman.

filmography.title: Silent Scream
filmography.role_description: The mysterious, stern landlady of a boarding house who harbors a dark secret in the attic.
filmography.plot: A college student finds rooming in a hilltop boarding house where a homicidal killer is on the loose.

filmography.title: Border River
filmography.role_description: A beautiful woman in a Mexican safe zone (Zona Libre) who becomes involved with a Confederate officer trying to buy arms.
filmography.plot: A Confederate officer steals Union gold to buy weapons in Mexico, but faces betrayal and romance in a lawless border town.

filmography.title: Passion
filmography.role_description: De Carlo plays dual roles as twin sisters in this western vengeance tale.
filmography.plot: A rancher seeks revenge against the land grabbers who murdered his family, aided by the twin sister of his slain wife.

filmography.title: The Munsters' Revenge
filmography.role_description: De Carlo returns as Lily Munster to clear the family name when wax museum robots frame them for a heist.
filmography.plot: The Munster family must prove their innocence after a wax museum owner uses robots resembling them to commit crimes.

filmography.title: Silver City
filmography.role_description: A woman trying to protect her father's silver mine from claim jumpers who hires a down-on-his-luck assayer to help.
filmography.plot: A mining assayer helps a father and daughter defend their silver claim against a ruthless businessman.

filmography.title: The Gal Who Took the West
filmography.role_description: An opera singer who travels to Arizona and becomes the object of a feud between two cousins.
filmography.plot: A feuding family's rivalry intensifies when a beautiful opera singer arrives in their western town.
filmography.awards: Photoplay Award: Win – Best Performance of the Month

filmography.title: American Gothic
filmography.role_description: The twisted matriarch of an eccentric, murderous family living in isolation on an island.
filmography.plot: A group of friends are forced to land their plane on a remote island, where they are terrorized by a bizarre, old-fashioned family.

filmography.title: Band of Angels
filmography.role_description: A privileged southern belle who discovers she has African ancestry and is sold into slavery, where she is purchased by a gentle plantation owner.
filmography.plot: A Kentucky belle is sold into slavery after learning her mother was a slave, leading to a complex relationship with her new master.

filmography.title: Flame of the Islands
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated woman who becomes a partner in a Bahamas nightclub, attracting romance and trouble.
filmography.plot: A woman invests her settlement money in a nightclub in the Bahamas and navigates a web of romance and crime.

filmography.title: Sea Devils
filmography.role_description: A spy posing as a French noblewoman during the Napoleonic Wars who recruits a smuggler for a dangerous mission.
filmography.plot: A Channel Islands smuggler aids a woman he believes to be a spy for Napoleon, only to discover her true allegiance.

filmography.title: Salome, Where She Danced
filmography.role_description: De Carlo's breakout role as a dancer who flees Europe for the American West, enchanting men wherever she goes.
filmography.plot: A dancer is forced to flee 19th-century Europe and reinvents herself in a small Arizona town, transforming it and the men around her.
